description.zh: 專注於政府資訊系統的數位韌性。訪談系統相關人員並基於產業最佳實務提供建議。
description.en: Focused on digital resilience of government information system. Interviewed with people around the systems and provide advice based on industrial best practices.

company.zh: 睿加科技股份有限公司

description.zh: 重構商標註冊自動化系統並與AI團隊合作。
description.en: Refactor the trademarks registration automation system and connected with AI team.

company.zh: 台南市政府智慧城市辦公室
company.en: Tainan City Government Smart City Office

description.zh: 發掘智慧城市案例並致力於推廣它們。
description.en: Discovered smart city cases and worked to promote them

description.zh: 安排市長行程並研究台南市民生活議題。
description.en: Arranged the mayor's schedule and studied Tainan citizens' livelihood issues

description.zh: 為國營企業提供開放資料政策技術支援，包括台電、台水和台糖。
description.en: Offered technical support to stated-owned enterprises on opendata policies. Including Taipower, Taiwater and Taisugar.

description.zh: 提供基於網頁的應用程式開發和客製化服務，主要使用CakePHP框架。
description.en: Provided web-based application development and customization, primarily using CakePHP framework.

company.zh: 智樂國際資訊有限公司

description.zh: 領導小型研發團隊（3-4人）使用CakePHP和Flex技術從零開始開發網站，為台灣市場提供類似cafepress.com的服務。
description.en: Led a small R&D team (3-4 members) developing website from scratch using CakePHP and Flex technologies, providing services similar to cafepress.com for Taiwan market.

description.zh: 使用CakePHP框架為IT支援部門開發票務系統。
description.en: Developed a ticket system for IT support department using CakePHP framework.

company.zh: 晟鑫科技股份有限公司

description.zh: 專精於PHP開發和使用XOOPS、OSCommerce等開源專案的現有應用程式客製化。
description.en: Specialized in PHP development and customization of existing applications using open source projects like XOOPS and OSCommerce.

company.zh: 學貫行銷股份有限公司

description.zh: 將網站從靜態HTML遷移到使用PHP的資料庫驅動系統，開發銷售和教育用途的私有系統。
description.en: Migrated website from static HTML to database-driven system using PHP, developed private systems for sales and educational purposes.
